title: Indians are more interested in watching cricket than caring about our soldiers.
selftext:
Indian govt is more interested in earning money through india pakistan cricket match as it's highest viewers.

Why are we still interacting with Pakistan. We should isolate them in everything with zero interaction.

It's the common man of country who is not nationalist and doesn't care abt our soldiers. Their forces/ terrorist backed organisation are killing our soldiers and we are enjoying cricket.

Big shame for us as we are sleeping and ignorant. All we need is entertainment. 

How can we enjoy while our brothers are dying for us
comments: Thankfully Indians have more sense than OP
Ah, tumhara to naam Ashwin h ðŸ˜†
